easy.prompt: Translate the following to English: 'p.o. q.a.m.'
easy.solution: 'p.o.' means by mouth; 'q.a.m.' means every morning.

easy.prompt: Translate the following to English: 'gtt i o.s. b.i.d.'
easy.solution: 'gtt i' means 1 drop; 'o.s.' denotes the left eye; 'b.i.d.' means twice daily.
answerText: instill 1 drop in the left eye twice daily
place one drop in the left eye twice a day

easy.prompt: Translate the following to English: 'Inject 30 units subcut q.o.d.'
easy.solution: 'q.o.d.' stands for every other day; 'subcut' means subcutaneously.
answerText: inject 30 units subcutaneously every other day
inject 30 units under the skin every other day

hard.prompt: English → Latin: Take 2 tablets by mouth 30 minutes before meals.
hard.solution: 'ii tabs' denotes two tablets; 'p.o.' means by mouth; 'a.c.' means before meals; 30 minutes can be written as '30 min'.

hard.prompt: English → Latin: Apply ointment to the affected area twice daily as needed.
hard.solution: 'ung.' is ointment; 'ad area affecta' means to the affected area; 'b.i.d.' is twice daily; 'p.r.n.' means as needed.
answerText: Apply ung. ad area affecta b.i.d. p.r.n.
Apply ointment ad area affecta b.i.d. p.r.n.
